string.text:
Used by special operations units and law enforcement personnel, the PP-2000 personal defense weapon is often considered to be one of the best in its class. It is compact, lightweight and simple in design for increased reliability and simplified maintenance.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]KBP Instrument Design Bureau
